get.summary: Gets Auction info by auction identifier

200.description: Successfully got Auction with specified ID

404.description: Auction with the provided ID was not found

get.summary: Gets list of bids the investor has made.

parameters.name: request.pageSize
parameters.description: Max items in result, up to 20000

200.description: Successfully got list of user's bids

202.description:
Successfully accepted the bid(s). 
            It may take some time until the bid requests are created. 
            It will take more time until the actual bid(s) are made for the Auction(s).

404.description: Auction with specified ID is not found

403.description: Not allowed to get the Bid, because the bid is not owned by current user

404.description: Bid with specified ID is not found

202.description: Successfully accepted the cancellation request for the Bid

403.description: The user has no rights to cancel the Bid

404.description: Bid with specified ID is not found

get.summary: Get report data for specified report identificator.

403.description: Not allowed to get the Report, because the Report is not owned by current user

404.description: Report with specified identificator was not found

post.summary: Request to generate specified report type for set period.

Successfully accepted request.

400.description: PeriodEnd is too large (more than 20 years from today)

Successfully got LoanPartDetails with specified ID

post.summary: Gets LoanPartDetails info by identifiers in a list (up to 1000 items).

parameters.name: request
parameters.description:
LoanPartDetails identifiers list.
            This endpoint supports both GET and POST methods.
            If using this endpoint with the GET method the request data must be sent with the request body, even though it is a GET request.
            The "Content-Type" header must be set so the server knows how to decode the data.

200.description: Successfully got LoanPartDetails with specified ID

404.description: LoanPart with the provided ID was not found

post.summary: Sell your loans to secondary market.
Remove your loans from secondary market.
Remove your loans from secondary market.

get.summary: Get the secondary market item summary

404.description: SecondaryMarket item with specified ID is not found

post.summary: Get the secondary market item summaries in a list

parameters.name: request
parameters.description:
SecondaryMarket item identificators.
            This endpoint supports both GET and POST methods.
            If using this endpoint with the GET method the request data must be sent with the request body, even though it is a GET request.
            The "Content-Type" header must be set so the server knows how to decode the data.

404.description: SecondaryMarket item with specified ID is not found

            true if the request was handled successfully, false otherwise.

GoGrowAccounts.description: List of Go and Grow accounts

ApiError.description: API Error object. Describes the error that occured.

Code.description: Code of the error. For machine reading.

Message.description: The error message for human reading.

Details.description:
Error details, if any. 
            For example the non valid Field's name or the Id of the failed object.

NetProfit.description: Everything you have gained from Go and Grow

CreditScore.description:
<para>
  1000 No previous payments problems</para>
<para>
  900 Payments problems finished 24-36 months ago</para>
<para>
  800 Payments problems finished 12-24 months ago</para>
<para>
  700 Payments problems finished 6-12 months ago</para>
<para>
  600 Payment problems finished <6 months ago</para>
<para>
  500 Active payment problems</para>

CreditScoreEsMicroL.description:
A score that is specifically designed for risk classifying subprime borrowers (defined by Equifax as borrowers that do not have access to bank loans). 
            A measure of the probability of default one month ahead.
            <para>The score is given on a 10-grade scale, from the best score to the worst:</para><para>M1, M2, M3, M4, M5, M6, M7, M8, M9, M10</para>

CreditScoreEsEquifaxRisk.description:
Generic score for the loan applicants that do not have active past due operations in ASNEF.
            A measure of the probability of default one year ahead. 
            The score is given on a 6-grade scale.
            <para>AAA Very low</para><para>AA Low</para><para>A Average</para><para>B Average High</para><para>C High</para><para>D Very High</para>

CreditScoreFiAsiakasTietoRiskGrade.description:
Credit Scoring model for Finnish Asiakastieto
            <para>RL1 Very low risk 01-20</para><para>RL2 Low risk 21-40</para><para>RL3 Average risk 41-60</para><para>RL4 Big risk 61-80</para><para>RL5 Huge risk 81-100</para>

CreditScoreEeMini.description:
Credit scoring for Estonian loans
            <para>1000 No previous payments problems</para><para>900 Payments problems finished 24-36 months ago</para><para>800 Payments problems finished 12-24 months ago</para><para>700 Payments problems finished 6-12 months ago</para><para>600 Payment problems finished <6 months ago</para><para>500 Active payment problems</para>

Rating.description: Bondora Rating issued by the Rating model

LoanStatusCode.description:
Loan status code
            <para>0 Reserved</para><para>2 Current</para><para>3 Cancelled</para><para>100 Overdue</para><para>5 60+ days overdue</para><para>4 Repaid</para><para>8 Released</para>

DebtOccuredOn.description: Date and time when the principal part of the payment is overdue (PrincipalLateAmount is greater than zero).

DebtOccuredOnForSecondary.description: Date and time when loan part payment is overdue (principal, interest or penalty) aka when the dept occured for the loan part (LateAmountTotal is greater than zero).

PrincipalWriteOffAmount.description: Total amount of principal written off

InterestWriteOffAmount.description: Total amount of interest written off

PenaltyWriteOffAmount.description: Total amount of penalty written off

DebtServicingCostMainAmount.description: Total amount of principal debt servicing cost

DebtServicingCostInterestAmount.description: Total amount of interest debt servicing cost

DebtServicingCostPenaltyAmount.description: Total amount of penalty debt servicing cost

PurchaseDate.description: Date when investment was made or purchased from second market

PurchasePrice.description: Investment amount or secondary market purchase price

ListedInSecondMarketOn.description: Date when item was listed on secondary market

NoteLoanTransfersMainAmount.description: Note owner received loan transfers principal amount

NoteLoanTransfersInterestAmount.description: Note owner received loan transfers interest amount

NoteLoanLateChargesPaid.description: Note owner received loan transfers penalties amount

NoteLoanTransfersEarningsAmount.description: Note owner received loan transfers earned interest, penalties total amount

NoteLoanTransfersTotalRepaimentsAmount.description: Note owner received loan transfers total amount

EventLogRequest.description: Request object for filtering event log

PageSize.description: Max items in result, up to 20000

Indicates if the request was successfull or not.
            true if the request was handled successfully, false otherwise.

Errors.description: Error(s) accociated with the API request.

NewCreditCustomer.description:
Did the customer have prior credit history in Bondora
            <para>0 Customer had at least 3 months of credit history in Bondora</para><para>1 No prior credit history in Bondora</para>

LoanApplicationStartedDate.description: Date when the loan application was started

PlannedCloseDate.description:
Date and time when the auction is closed, if it's not funded 100% before that.
            Auction will be closed before that, if auction is funded 100%.

ApplicationSignedHour.description: Hour of signing the loan application

ApplicationSignedWeekday.description: Weekday of signing the loan application

CreditScoreEsMicroL.description:
A score that is specifically designed for risk classifying subprime borrowers (defined by Equifax as borrowers that do not have access to bank loans). 
            A measure of the probability of default one month ahead.
            <para>The score is given on a 10-grade scale, from the best score to the worst:</para><para>M1, M2, M3, M4, M5, M6, M7, M8, M9, M10</para>

CreditScoreEsEquifaxRisk.description:
Generic score for the loan applicants that do not have active past due operations in ASNEF.
            A measure of the probability of default one year ahead. 
            The score is given on a 6-grade scale.
            <para>AAA Very low</para><para>AA Low</para><para>A Average</para><para>B Average High</para><para>C High</para><para>D Very High</para>

CreditScoreFiAsiakasTietoRiskGrade.description:
Credit Scoring model for Finnish Asiakastieto
            <para>RL1 Very low risk 01-20</para><para>RL2 Low risk 21-40</para><para>RL3 Average risk 41-60</para><para>RL4 Big risk 61-80</para><para>RL5 Huge risk 81-100</para>

CreditScoreEeMini.description:
Credit scoring for Estonian loans
            <para>1000 No previous payments problems</para><para>900 Payments problems finished 24-36 months ago</para><para>800 Payments problems finished 12-24 months ago</para><para>700 Payments problems finished 6-12 months ago</para><para>600 Payment problems finished <6 months ago</para><para>500 Active payment problems</para>

AppliedAmount.description: The amount borrower applied for originally

Interest.description: Maximum interest rate accepted in the loan application

EmploymentDurationCurrentEmployer.description: Employment time with the current employer

MonthlyPaymentDay.description:
The day of the month the loan payments are scheduled for.
            The actual date is adjusted for weekends and bank holidays.
            E.g. if 10th is a Sunday then the payment will be made on the 11th in that month.

ModelVersion.description: The version of the Rating model used for issuing the Bondora Rating

ExpectedLoss.description: Expected Loss calculated by the Rating model

Rating.description: Bondora Rating issued by the Rating model

LossGivenDefault.description:
Gives the percentage of outstanding exposure at the time of default that an investor is likely to lose if a loan actually defaults. 
            This means the proportion of funds lost for the investor after all expected recovery and accounting for the time value of the money recovered. 
            In general, LGD parameter is intended to be estimated based on the historical recoveries. However, in new markets where limited experience does not allow us more precise loss given default estimates, a LGD of 90% is assumed.

ProbabilityOfDefault.description: Probability of Default, refers to a loans probability of default within one year horizon.

ActualCloseDate.description: Date and time when the auction was actually closed. Is null, if auction is active.

WinningBidsAmount.description:
The amount that auction is fulfilled, taken amount only bids where investors have enough funds.
            This is preliminary calculated amount and can change when trying to close auction (auction is closed, when auction is funded 100% or PlannedCloseDate is reached) and specific investor(s) do not have enough funds.

RemainingAmount.description: The amount that is remaining to be funded (AppliedAmount - WinningBidsAmount).

UserBids.description: How many bids current user has bidden into the auction

UserBidAmount.description: How much current user has bidden into the auction

Fullfilled.description: Precentage, how much the auction is fulfilled. Can be more than 100%, if overfunded.

CreditScore.description:
<para>
  1000 No previous payments problems</para>
<para>
  900 Payments problems finished 24-36 months ago</para>
<para>
  800 Payments problems finished 12-24 months ago</para>
<para>
  700 Payments problems finished 6-12 months ago</para>
<para>
  600 Payment problems finished <6 months ago</para>
<para>
  500 Active payment problems</para>

ScoringDate.description: Date when the Rating was calculated for this loan

Use of loan

EADRate.description: Exposure at Default (expressed as a percentage of the original loan amount), indicates outstanding investor exposure at the time of default, including outstanding principal amount plus accrued but unpaid interests.

MaturityFactor.description: Maturity Factor M of 1.3 is assumed for loans with duration exceeding one year.

LoanId.description: A unique ID given to a loan

LoanNumber.description: A unique loan number displayed in Bondora's system

ListedOnUTC.description: Date when the loan application appeared on Primary Market

BiddingStartedOn.description: Date when the auction bidding started on

BidsPortfolioManager.description: The amount of investment offers made by Portfolio Managers

BidsApi.description: The amount of investment offers made via Api

BidsManual.description: The amount of investment offers made manually

NewCreditCustomer.description:
<para>Did the customer have prior credit history in Bondora</para>
<para>
  false Customer had at least 3 months of credit history in Bondora</para>
<para>
  true No prior credit history in Bondora</para>

LoanApplicationStartedDate.description: Date when the loan application was started

LoanDate.description: Date when the loan was issued

ContractEndDate.description: Date when the loan contract ended

FirstPaymentDate.description: First payment date according to initial loan schedule

MaturityDate_Original.description: Loan maturity date according to the original loan schedule

MaturityDate_Last.description: Loan maturity date as of the report generation date

ApplicationSignedHour.description: Hour of signing the loan application

ApplicationSignedWeekday.description: Weekday of signing the loan application

VerificationType.description: Method used for loan application data verification

MonthlyPayment.description: Estimated amount the borrower has to pay every month

NrOfDependants.description: Number of children or other dependants

EmploymentDurationCurrentEmployer.description: Employment time with the current employer

EmploymentPosition.description: Employment position with the current employer

RefinanceLiabilities.description: The total amount of liabilities after refinancing

MonthlyPaymentDay.description: The day of the month the loan payments are scheduled for The actual date is adjusted for weekends and bank holidays (e.g. if 10th is Sunday then the payment will be made on the 11th in that month)

ActiveScheduleFirstPaymentReached.description: Whether the first payment date has been reached according to the active schedule

PlannedPrincipalTillDate.description: According to active schedule the amount of principal the investment should have received

PlannedInterestTillDate.description: According to active schedule the amount of interest the investment should have received

LastPaymentOn.description: The date of the current last payment received from the borrower

CurrentDebtDaysPrimary.description: How long the loan has been in Principal Debt

DebtOccuredOn.description: The date when Principal Debt occurred

CurrentDebtDaysSecondary.description: How long the loan has been in Interest Debt

DebtOccuredOnForSecondary.description: The date when Interest Debt occurred

ExpectedLoss.description: Expected Loss calculated by the current Rating model

LossGivenDefault.description:
Gives the percentage of outstanding exposure at the time of default that an investor is likely to lose if a loan actually defaults. 
            This means the proportion of funds lost for the investor after all expected recovery and accounting for the time value of the money recovered. 
            In general, LGD parameter is intended to be estimated based on the historical recoveries. 
            However, in new markets where limited experience does not allow us more precise loss given default estimates, a LGD of 90% is assumed.

ExpectedReturn.description: Expected Return calculated by the current Rating model

ProbabilityOfDefault.description: Probability of Default, refers to a loans probability of default within one year horizon.

DefaultDate.description: The date when loan went into defaulted state and collection process was started

PrincipalOverdueBySchedule.description: According to the current schedule, principal that is overdue

PlannedPrincipalPostDefault.description: The amount of principal that was planned to be received after the default occurred

PlannedInterestPostDefault.description: The amount of interest that was planned to be received after the default occurred

EAD1.description: Exposure at default, outstanding principal at default

EAD2.description: Exposure at default, loan amount less all payments prior to default

PrincipalRecovery.description: Principal recovered due to collection process from in debt loans

InterestRecovery.description: Interest recovered due to collection process from in debt loans

RecoveryStage.description: Current stage according to the recovery model 1 Collection 2 Recovery 3 Write Off

StageActiveSince.description: How long the current recovery stage has been active

ModelVersion.description: The version of the Rating model used for issuing the Bondora Rating

Rating.description: Bondora Rating issued by the Rating model

EL_V0.description: Expected loss calculated by the specified version of Rating model

Rating_V0.description: Bondora Rating issued by version 0 of the Rating model

EL_V1.description: Expected loss calculated by the specified version of Rating model

Rating_V1.description: Bondora Rating issued by version 1 of the Rating model

EL_V2.description: Expected loss calculated by the specified version of Rating model

Rating_V2.description: Bondora Rating issued by version 2 of the Rating model

Status.description: The current status of the loan application

Restructured.description: The original maturity date of the loan has been increased by more than 60 days

ActiveLateCategory.description: When a loan is in Principal Debt then it will be categorized by Principal Debt days

WorseLateCategory.description: Displays the last longest period of days when the loan was in Principal Debt

CreditScoreEsMicroL.description:
A score that is specifically designed for risk classifying subprime borrowers (defined by Equifax as borrowers that do not have access to bank loans). 
            A measure of the probability of default one month ahead.
            <para>The score is given on a 10-grade scale, from the best score to the worst:</para><para>M1, M2, M3, M4, M5, M6, M7, M8, M9, M10</para>

CreditScoreEsEquifaxRisk.description:
Generic score for the loan applicants that do not have active past due operations in ASNEF.
            A measure of the probability of default one year ahead. 
            The score is given on a 6-grade scale.
            <para>AAA Very low</para><para>AA Low</para><para>A Average</para><para>B Average High</para><para>C High</para><para>D Very High</para>

CreditScoreFiAsiakasTietoRiskGrade.description:
Credit Scoring model for Finnish Asiakastieto
            <para>RL1 Very low risk 01-20</para><para>RL2 Low risk 21-40</para><para>RL3 Average risk 41-60</para><para>RL4 Big risk 61-80</para><para>RL5 Huge risk 81-100</para>

CreditScoreEeMini.description:
Credit scoring for Estonian loans
            <para>1000 No previous payments problems</para><para>900 Payments problems finished 24-36 months ago</para><para>800 Payments problems finished 12-24 months ago</para><para>700 Payments problems finished 6-12 months ago</para><para>600 Payment problems finished <6 months ago</para><para>500 Active payment problems</para>

PrincipalPaymentsMade.description: Note owner received loan transfers principal amount

InterestAndPenaltyPaymentsMade.description: Note owner received loan transfers earned interest, penalties total amount

PrincipalWriteOffs.description: Principal that was written off on the investment

InterestAndPenaltyWriteOffs.description: Interest that was written off on the investment

PrincipalDebtServicingCost.description: Service cost related to the recovery of the debt based on the principal of the investment

InterestAndPenaltyDebtServicingCost.description: Service cost related to the recovery of the debt based on the interest and penalties of the investment

PrincipalBalance.description: Principal that still needs to be paid by the borrower

PreviousRepaymentsBeforeLoan.description: How much the borrower had repaid before the loan

PreviousEarlyRepaymentsBeforeLoan.description: Previous early repaid amount before this loan

PreviousEarlyRepaymentsCountBeforeLoan.description: Previous early repaid loans before this loan

GracePeriodStart.description: Date of the beginning of Grace period

GracePeriodEnd.description: Date of the end of Grace period

NextPaymentDate.description: According to schedule the next date for borrower to make their payment

NextPaymentNr.description: According to schedule the number of the next payment

NrOfScheduledPayments.description: According to schedule the count of scheduled payments

ReScheduledOn.description: The date when the a new schedule was assigned to the borrower

Payload.description: The payload of the response. Type depends on the API request.

            true if the request was handled successfully, false otherwise.

<list type="bullet">
  <item>
    <term>SecondMarketArchive</term>
    <description>the type is {Sobralaen.Api.Models.SecondMarketArchiveReportLine}</description>
  </item>
  <item>
    <term>AccountStatement</term>

  </item>
  <item>

  </item>
  <item>

  </item>
  <item>
    <term>PlannedFutureCashflows</term>
    <description>the type is {Sobralaen.Api.Models.FutureCashflowsReportLine}</description>
  </item>
  <item>
    <term>InvestmentsV2</term>
    <description>the type is {Sobralaen.Api.Models.InvestmentsListReportLineV2}</description>
  </item>
</list>

PrincipalWriteOffAmount.description: Total amount of principal written off

InterestWriteOffAmount.description: Total amount of interest written off

PenaltyWriteOffAmount.description: Total amount of penalty written off

DebtServicingCostMainAmount.description: Total amount of principal debt servicing cost

DebtServicingCostInterestAmount.description: Total amount of interest debt servicing cost

DebtServicingCostPenaltyAmount.description: Total amount of penalty debt servicing cost

Price.description: Outstanding principal balance +/- discount or mark-up

Fee.description: Secondary market purchase fee paid to Bondora

OutstandingPayments.description: Total amount still to be repaid by the borrower. This includes the principal balance, accrued interest and late charges as well as any future scheduled interest payments

Xirr.description:
XIRR (extended internal rate of return) is a methodology to calculate the net return using the loan issued date and amount, 
            loan repayment dates and amounts and the principal balance according to the original repayment date. 
            All overdue principal payments are written off immediately. No provisions for future losses are made and only received (not accrued or scheduled) 
            interest payments are taken into account.

DebtManagmentEvents.description:
Webhook only:
            Debt managment event collection

LoanTransfers.description:
Webhook only:
            Collection of all loan payments

ScheduledPayments.description:
Webhook only:
            Collection of all loan scheduled payments. 
            Contains previous period values before rescheduling was made

DebtManagementEvent.description: Information about the Loan's debt management stage event history

Description.description: Type as a description, obsolete: use EventType

PrincipalAmountLeft.description: Scheduled principal amount remaining after payment

IntrestAmountCarriedOver.description: Interest amount carried over from rescheduling

PenaltyAmountCarriedOver.description: Penalty amount carried over from rescheduling
